text: Theodore Taylor (June 23, 1921 - October 26, 2006) was an American author and singer. He wrote more than 50 books, but is mostly known for his Edgar Award- winning book The Weirdo and The Cay. Taylor was born on June 23, 1921 in Statesville, North Carolina. He was never married and had no children. Taylor died on October 26, 2006 in his home in Laguna Beach, California from a heart attack, aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== *Theodore Taylor's website *Stewart, Jocelyn.
